title: Tech Blog - Nathan Ross Powell
subtitle: Thoughts on video game development and technology topics from an industry veteran and lifelong programmer.

author.name: Nathan Ross Powell
author.bio: Nathan is an innovative technology leader with a talent for guiding teams through challenges, creating dynamic tech visions, and fostering iterative growth. With a proven track record in transforming online experiences, optimizing workflows, and managing international collaborations, Nathan has earned a reputation for exceptional execution and leadership in the tech industry.
